bug.title: OI Notepad: Sort order does not work with encrypted notes
bug.description:
``` What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. In OI Notepad, choose alphabetical sort ordering. 2. Encrypted notes appear at seemingly random places.
Encrypted notes are sorted according to their encrypted version, not according to the decrypted string. ```
Original issue reported on code.google.com by `peli0...@googlemail.com` on 20 Jan 2009 at 9:54
